EmailTemplate.name: Markit Hub, sales sponsor request
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub, sales sponsor request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
As per the below email from <Research Provider Company Name> , we require a sales sponsor's name so that we can validate your request to access <Research Provider Company Name> research via Markit Hub.
Once we have this from you, we will get in touch with them to expedite the approval process in order to get your access set up. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
